item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: Welcome to my blog. This is my little corner of the web where I will post content on code, tech and stuff that interests me.

item.title: Hi! I'm Daniel
item.description: I build and break stuff, with a focus on embedded systems, firmware development, and software development. I enjoy problem solving and working on impactful projects. I am on a perpetual learning journey and I’m constantly exploring new challenges and opportunities to grow. When I’m not listening to music, tinkering with electronics, or writing code, you can catch me on the football field, enjoying the beautiful game.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Reach out to me via Mail or Mobile
